features: Blister guard system: The system utilizes NanoGlide in the heel, pad and the toe of the sock. This significantly reduces friction between the sock and the skin, eliminates blisters and irritations, and guarantees the comfort and performance.
NanoGLIDE® significantly reduces friction between the sock and the skin, eliminating blisters and irritations, and guaranteeing the comfort and performance that an active person demands.
Anatomical design: Designed to precisely fit human bone structures.
Elastic ankle support: Specially designed elastic strip in ankle area prevents injury of ligaments and ankle muscles without restricting free joint movement.
Flat toe seam: Gives superior comfort in the toe area.
Reinforced heel: Improves comfort, better durability and shock absorption.
Reinforced toe: Improves comfort and durability.
Specially shaped welt: For protection and comfort.
